data.actual_result: The option is in the wrong section
data.expected_result: Reset Notification settings option has nothing to do in Channel settings, it should be in Notifications
data.short_description: "Reset Notification settings" is under Channel settings instead of Notifications
data.steps_to_repro: - Expand the overflow menu - Go to Notifications - Notice the Reset Notification settings option is not there - Go back and open Channel settings instead - Now it's here
